alert.note: Alert for Clay; Shelby; Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 7:04PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Talladega, southeastern Shelby and southwestern Clay Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 704 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Oak Grove, or near Sylacauga, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sylacauga, Childersburg, Wilsonville, Talladega Springs, Harpersville, Oak Grove, Bon Air, Fayetteville, Winterboro, Sycamore, Lay Lake, Sylacauga Municipal Airport, Alabama 4H Center, Overbrook, Shelby Shores, Cedar Creek, Gantts Quarry, Hollins, Kelley Branch and Varnons. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
